review: Very limited content unless you sign up for prime. Apps r not enoughBlatant lies of claims. some very crucial info that they show in their comparision to other competitor devices is false.The power supply is only good if attached to wall jack. Having a similar setting to chromecast results in lack of power and reduced/horrible performance.
author: pratik

review: It does everything as advertised. I did get confused on one issue...I thought that this could convert my TV to a "smart" TV allowing me to surf the internet however if that is possible I don't know how to do it.
author: Duane Sneller

review: Easy to set up and works well.
author: jennifer eagan

review: I love this gadget!  In fact, this month I plan on buying a small flat screen TV for the bedroom and purchasing another Fire Stick!  Wish I'd done it sooner!  :-)
author: P. J. Harris

review: Pretty cool ! Movie a little pricey.
author: Michael L.

review: Exceeded expectations!  I love the ease!!
author: kathleen Heath
